snippet: This formidable Broadway tenor embodies an emerging theatrical archetype: the dashing but sensitive hero. He talked about love in highly personal terms.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert Romantic Notions by singer Jason Danieley at Feinstein's/54 Below.
lead_paragraph: This formidable Broadway tenor embodies an emerging theatrical archetype: the dashing but sensitive hero. He talked about love in highly personal terms.

headline.main: Review: Jason Danieley Sings and Talks About Love at Feinstein’s/54 Below
headline.print_headline: A Broadway Balladeer Steers Clear of Bluster to Focus on Real Love
